### Question 1

(a) 

```{r, echo=TRUE}
# this is where your R code goes
library(forecast)

souvenir <- scan("souvenir.txt")

souvenir_ts <- ts(souvenir, start = c(1987, 1), frequency = 12)

plot(souvenir_ts, 
     main = "Monthly Sales of Souvenir Shop (1987-1993)", 
     ylab = "Sales (A$)",
     xlab = "Time")

acf(souvenir_ts, main = "Sample ACF of Souvenir Sales")

```


(b)

```{r, echo=TRUE}
# this is where your R code goes
holt_model <- HoltWinters(souvenir_ts, seasonal = "multiplicative")
holt_model

plot(holt_model,
     main = "Holt-Winters Filtering: Souvenir Sales",
     ylab = "Sales (A$)",
     xlab = "Time")
```
